title: VVoe to drunkards A sermon by Samuel Ward preacher of Ipswich.
author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by A[ugustine] Math[ewes] for Iohn Marriott, and Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at their shops in St. Dunstons Church-yard, and in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,
